title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: High-profile Labor senator Penny Wong is challenging the prime minister to clarify whether he lobbied the White House to invite an Australian religious figure to last month's state dinner. Scott Morrison repeatedly refused to say whether he suggested Hillsong pastor Brian Houston should be included on the guest list. Departmental officials and Finance Minister Mathias Cormann also refused to elaborate during a senate estimates hearing on Monday. Senator Wong said the prime minister should be "man enough and brave enough to answer the question". Image: News Corp Australia
